oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Bootable container or bootc system

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Package grub2 is installed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Checks if package grub2-common is installed.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Test if OPAL is not used

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: WiFi interface is present
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Checks if any wifi interface is present.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Check if the scan target is a container
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check for presence of files characterizing container filesystems.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Check if the scan target is a machine
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check for absence of files characterizing container filesystems.

oval-def:extend_definition.comment: If environment is not a container, it is machine

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Remote NFS file system mount is defined
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: At least one remote NFS file system mount is defined in /etc/fstab

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test that the architecture is aarch64
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel is aarch64

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test for different architecture than s390x
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is not s390x

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test that the architecture is ppc64le
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel is ppc64le

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test that the architecture is s390x
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel is s390x

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test that the architecture is x86_64
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel is x86_64

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Running kernel has fips mode enabled
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check if sysctl crypto.fips_enabled = 1

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: SELinux status check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check if System has SELinux enabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: SSSD is configured to use LDAP
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

oval-def:criterion.comment: Identification provider is set to ldap within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Non-UEFI system boot mode check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check if System boot mode is non-UEFI.

oval-def:extend_definition.comment: Pass if System boot mode is non-UEFI

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: UEFI system boot mode check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check if system boot mode is UEFI.
The kernel is installed

check if ipv6.disable parameter is defined in /etc/default/grub
